prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
SUNIL KUMAR REDDY BOREDDY
+91 6300178187 | sunilboreddy1999@gmail.com
SUMMARY
IT professional with 3.5 years of hands-on experience in the BFSI domain, specializing in .NET Frameworks, SQL, and Selenium
Automation. Experienced in managing the entire project lifecycle, including end-to-end planning, development, and delivery.
Proficient in Agile methodologies, ensuring seamless collaboration and adaptability in dynamic environments. Recognized for
problem solving skills, technical expertise, and a commitment to driving business success through innovative solutions.
EXPERIENCE
Tech Mahindra Bengaluru, India
Project : LSEG(London Stock Exchange Group)
Role :- Software Engineer Sep 2021 - Current
Technologies: .NET Core, C#, ASP.NET, Web API, Azure Cloud, SQL Server, MicroServices
• Developed and maintained applications using .NET Frameworks C#, ASP.NET MVC, MS SQL and Web API using
.NET Core, ensuring seamless integration, scalability, and secure data exchange between distributed systems.
• Designed and implemented console applications to support automation and backend processing tasks.
• Gained hands-on experience in SQL, including creating and managing tables, views, stored procedures and
performing CRUD operations on databases to support application functionality. Assisted in database design
and optimization to enhance the performance and scalability of .NET applications.
• Actively participated in all phases of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), including requirement
gathering, design, development, testing, and deployment.
• Migrated a monolithic application to a cloud-native microservices architecture using .NET Core
• Addressed and resolved client queries, providing efficient technical solutions and ensuring customer
satisfaction. Diagnosed and resolved application issues by analysing and fixing bugs in .NET Framework
applications, ensuring smooth functionality and enhanced user experience.
EDUCATION
Audisankara College of Engineering & Technology Gudur,
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
